summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 are largely implemented (Canvas renderer calibration, lighting balance, key light camera-sync, LandModel updateMatrixWorld+Box3 safety, guarded traversal, glow list emissive behavior, and envMapIntensity rules). However, REQ-1’s HemisphereLight uses `color` instead of the explicitly-required `skyColor` prop. Additionally, several unrelated/non-requested files appear to have been changed/added, violating the “strictly limited changes” constraint and immutable-path constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: HemisphereLight must use intensity={1.05} with skyColor="#f7f7f7" and groundColor="#3a3a3a" (skyColor prop explicitly required).
missing_requirements.reason: CubeVisualization uses `<hemisphereLight ... color="#f7f7f7" groundColor="#3a3a3a" />` rather than the explicitly specified `skyColor` prop.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified an immutable frontend hook file that was explicitly constrained to not be edited.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints forbid edits to `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, but the diff lists it as modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new `project_state.json` file that is not requested by any requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only target CubeVisualization.tsx and LandModel.tsx changes plus stability constraints; no requirement requests adding project metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated broad UI/style/component changes beyond the V.10.1.PBR scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly says to keep changes strictly limited to implementing the V.10.1.PBR prompt requirements and not introduce unrelated refactors; the diff summary lists extensive changes across many non-target files (e.g., App, pages, map, animations, CSS).
